text: saare manushy ek hee samudaay the (unhonne vibhed kiya) to allaah ne nabiyon ko bheja, jo shubh-soochana denevaale aur daraanavaale the; aur unake saath haq par aadhaarit kitaab utaaree, taaki logon mein un baaton ka jinamen ve vibhed kar rahe hai, faisala kar de. isamen vibhed to bas unheen logon ne, jinhen vah milee thee, paraspar zyaadatee karane ke lie isake pashchaat kiya, jabaki khulee nishaaniyaan unake paas aa chukee thee. atah eemaanavaalon ko allaah ne apanee anoogya se us saty ke vishay mein maargadarshan kiya, jisamen unhonne vibhed kiya tha. allaah jise chaahata hai, seedhe maarg par chalaata hai
